SEARCH
Package com.example.donotredeem

Class EditMoodEventTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.donotredeem.EditMoodEventFragmentTest
public class EditMoodEventTest extends Object
Unit tests for the EditMoodEvent fragment's button mapping functionality. This class verifies the correct association between UI button IDs and their corresponding mood types/social situations, including handling of invalid IDs.

Key test scenarios include:

  • Valid button ID to MoodType mapping verification
  • Valid button ID to SocialSituation mapping verification
  • Null returns for unrecognized button IDs

Uses reflection to modify private button ID arrays for controlled testing.

    • testGetMoodForButtonId_validIds

      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection field modification fails

    • testGetMoodForButtonId_invalidId

      public void testGetMoodForButtonId_invalidId() throws Exception
      Tests handling of unrecognized mood button IDs. Verifies null return for IDs not present in configured button array.

      Exception - if reflection field modification fails

    • testGetSocialSituationForButtonId_validIds

      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection field modification fails
